languages.text: "Почтенный и славный потомок благословенного Вольного Торговца Каллигоса Винтерскейла, хозяина системы Райкад. По велению своего блистательного батюшки... или дедушки... или дядюшки... в общем, своего блистательного предка почтенный Эвейн поселился на Райкаде Минорис".

"The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."
languages.original_text: "Почтенный и славный потомок благословенного Вольного Торговца Каллигоса Винтерскейла, хозяина системы Райкад. По велению своего блистательного батюшки... или дедушки... или дядюшки... в общем, своего блистательного предка почтенный Эвейн поселился на Райкаде Минорис".

"The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

"The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

languages.text: "Der ehrenwerte Sprössling des verstorbenen Freihändlers Calligos Winterzunder, Meister des Rykad-Systems. Auf Geheiß seines illustren Vaters ... oder Großvaters ... oder Onkels ... nun, seines illustren Verwandten hat Lord Evayne sich auf Rykad Minoris niedergelassen."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Der ehrenwerte Sprössling des verstorbenen Freihändlers Calligos Winterzunder, Meister des Rykad-Systems. Auf Geheiß seines illustren Vaters ... oder Großvaters ... oder Onkels ... nun, seines illustren Ahnen hat Lord Evayne sich auf Rykad Minoris niedergelassen."

languages.text: « L'honorable fils du très saint Calligos Winterscale, libre-marchand et maître du système de Rykad. Sur ordre de son illustre père... ou grand-père... ou oncle, je ne sais plus. Bref, sur ordre de son illustre parent, le seigneur Evayne a élu domicile sur Rykad Minoris. »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: « L'honorable fils du très saint Calligos Winterscale, libre-marchand et maître du système de Rykad. Sur ordre de son illustre père... ou grand-père... ou oncle, je ne sais plus. Bref, sur ordre de son illustre aïeul, le seigneur Evayne a élu domicile sur Rykad Minoris. »

languages.text: “他是温特斯凯尔家族显赫的后人。他的父亲是莱卡德星系的主人，受到祝福的行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。在他杰出的父亲……或者是祖父……又或者是叔叔……嗯……总之，在他杰出亲戚的授意下，艾维尼大人定居在小莱卡德。”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: “他是温特斯凯尔家族显赫的后人。他的父亲是莱卡德星系的主人，受到祝福的行商浪人卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔。在他杰出的父亲……或者是祖父……又或者是叔叔……嗯……总之，在他杰出前辈的授意下，艾维尼大人定居在小莱卡德。”

languages.text: 「恩寵受けし自由開拓者にしてライカド星系の主、カリゴス・ウィンタースケール様の立派で高潔な御曹司です。高名な父…あるいは祖父か…おじか…とにかく、高名な親戚たちの命に従い、エヴァイン卿はライカド・ミノリスに居を定めました」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: 「恩寵受けし自由開拓者にしてライカド星系の主、カリゴス・ウィンタースケール様の立派で高潔な御曹司です。高名な父…あるいは祖父か…おじか…とにかく、高名な先人たちの命に従い、エヴァイン卿はライカド・ミノリスに居を定めました」

languages.text: «El estimado y honorable vástago del bendito Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale, maestro del sistema Rykad. A petición de su ilustre padre... o abuelo... o tío... bueno, de su ilustre pariente, Lord Evayne fijó su residencia en Rykad Minoris».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: «El estimado y honorable vástago del bendito Comerciante Independiente Calligos Winterscale, maestro del Sistema Rykad. A petición de su ilustre padre... o abuelo... o tío... bueno, de su ilustre antepasado, Lord Evayne fijó su residencia en Rykad Minoris».

languages.text: "Kendisi, Rykad Sistemi'nin efendisi mübarek Hür Tacir Calligos Winterscale'in saygın ve şerefli soydaşıdır. Lord Evayne, şanlı babasının... Yok, dedesinin... Şey, amcasının... İşte şanlı akrabasının buyruğuyla Rykad Minoris'te ikamet etmeye başladı."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed and honourable scion of blessed Rogue Trader Calligos Winterscale, master of the Rykad System. At the behest of his illustrious father... or grandfather... or uncle... well, his illustrious relative, Lord Evayne took up residence on Rykad Minoris."

traits.locale_text: "Kendisi, Rykad Sistemi'nin efendisi mübarek Hür Tacir Calligos Winterscale'in saygın ve şerefli soydaşıdır. Lord Evayne, şanlı babasının... Yok, dedesinin... Şey, amcasının... İşte şanlı akrabasının buyruğuyla Rykad Minoris'te ikamet etmeye başladı."
